corner-cafe.guessed_correct_title: You are correct! this item is waste sadly
corner-cafe.guessed_correct_body: This is waste. Unfortunately, these cups are lined with plastic and very few facilities can recycle them. Please consider bringing your own mug next time.

nestle-cookie.guessed_correct_title: You are correct! this item is sadly waste
nestle-cookie.guessed_correct_body: These are waste. Sadly these cannot be recycled in your curbside bin but they can be recycled through Terracycle. Visit Recycle LFLB to find Terracycle drop off points near you
